settings.title: Fresh-roasted coffee for your cafe or restaurant

settings.rich_text: Many coffee roasters focus on one of these two aspects of the industry: They serve excellent coffee, but you don’t know what they stand for. Or, they have an incredible cause but their coffee leaves something to be desired. At Wild Goose, you get both: Excellent coffee and an incredible cause, connecting with your customers’ passions and fuelling growth for your business.

settings.heading: Serving Excellence
settings.rich_text: Ethically-sourced artisan coffee that isn’t roasted until you order it. It’s roasted, bagged, and shipped the day after you order (weekends excluded), so you get it quickly and at its peak flavor. We’ll even train your staff on how to make it taste amazing!

settings.heading: Giving Back
settings.rich_text: Every pound of coffee you order provides 10 lbs of food to a food bank in your local area, so your customers can participate in giving back to their local community through their coffee purchases.

settings.heading: Profitable Business
settings.rich_text: Connecting your business to a local cause increases customer loyalty, organic advertising, and sales. Cafes switching to Wild Goose tend to see a boost in sales of 20% on average after just a few months.

settings.title: We Help Businesses Grow
settings.text: We specialize in helping cafes take their coffee game to the next level. It starts with a high-quality product, then continues with our free training program so your staff can learn how to create high-quality coffee and espresso drinks, every time. We also offer free business consulting, ranging from menu and recipe creation, marketing ideas for your cafe, even bar layout for new construction. With over 15 years of experience in coffee, we want to see you crush it as a cafe or restaurant owner and are here to help!

settings.title: Get in touch today
settings.subtext: Interested in learning more? Tell us a little about yourself, your coffee program, and we’ll be in touch to get a call or in-person scheduled!
